name: Space Shooter (itch) (Masterluke76)
description:
This game is a classic arcade game from back in the day.

Instructions for the game

1. Use the space key to fire your lasers be aware you only get 15 shots until you collect the powerup.

2. Hit the F key you will fire a missile that tracks the enemy that it is locked on Once again you only get 3 of these until you collect the green gem.

3. Hit the shift key this will allow you to speed up for a short period of time.

4. Hit the the C key this works as a magnet and will draw the power ups to you but be cautious because if it is in front of a enemy they will blast it away.

See if you can reach the Boss, Good Luck and may the force be with you!
